p: The need for alternative and less toxic therapies for different kind of cancers, is clear. Based on studies conducted, as a natural remedy, A. persicus prevents ontogenesis of T47D breast carcinoma cells by mechanisms such as apoptosis. It seems that A.persicus contains compounds that may have anti-cancer effects, probably due to newly identified1, 3-benzodioxole compounds present in this plant. Also, antibacterial, antioxidant and insecticide activitieswere reported.
